website_summaries.verdict: This attractive cast aluminum set is sturdy without being too heavy to move. The ornate cutout pattern design gives it a classic bistro look.
pros: We love how easy this set is to assemble and that it requires no maintenance to keep it in top condition
The hole in the center gives you space to place an umbrella, if desired

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: 225 lb weight limit spec on the chairs, though they held a 275 lb guest at least for a short while without a problem here -- just be aware it could be an issue. Very pretty set for a patio or balcony - looks better in person than in the photos. Could be heavier weight, but for the price it doesn't feel cheap like expected. The pieces take up very little space when the chairs are pushed under the table, while the table is just sturdy enough to be used as a functioning table not merely decoration. Not quite as heavy duty as expected yet would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: PMIAshopper

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a long time for a bistro set for our small front porch before purchasing this one. I love it! It is the perfect size, it is sturdy, and it looks really nice in a small space like ours. Assembly did not take long at all. It is definitely functional too, I have my morning coffee overlooking the Texan sunrise from this thing every morning!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Four Legs Would've Been Better
customer_reviews.text: It was easy enough to put together. And it looks decent enough. The price was fair. My only complaint is that because it has three legs, it can tip over easily if you lean on it. I'd pay more for the ones with four legs. Four legs would be more stable.
customer_reviews.author: sanmiguel

customer_reviews.title: CHAIR LEGS DEFECTIVE AND BREAK!  (Read the reviews)
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't long before a chair leg broke due to a manufacturing defect (not wear/tear), rendering the set useless. According to reviews, this is a common problem. Not sure why this is considered an "Amazon Choice" product given the defect.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. ZW

customer_reviews.title: Aluminum not cast iron
customer_reviews.text: Don't wast your money , none of the holes for the chairs lined up unable to put them togeather table is very light weight aluminum very cheaply made , the table is nice but we were unable to put chairs together as holes were way off did not line up very disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Howe

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: For this money, I was really surprised at how light weight and small the chair seats were. It's certainly nice to look at, and I'm keeping it as it's not somewhere we will sit very often. If you're looking for something to use regularly or need something with substance... this NOT your set.
customer_reviews.author: CAA

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted for my flower garden
customer_reviews.text: I love the ornate look of this set and it really looks lovely in my yard. These pieces were easy to assemble. The package came with everything I needed. It does take some time to put together but it went together smoothly. This table set is not for people over 250 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Teachaway

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Bistro Set
customer_reviews.text: I love this little set. Now my husband and I are on the small side - 5'1" & 5'4" respectively - so it fits us very well. I do think they may be a little small for people that are taller or heavier than us. That being said, I really love the design and the quality is fairly good.
customer_reviews.author: cle

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this patio bistro set
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this patio bistro set, that can stand the Arizona monsoon season. Easily hosed off after a dust storm, and stays where I put it (anyone having to corral their patio furniture from around the back yard ,or the neighborhood, after the extreme winds and heavy rains knows what I mean). The open work design keeps the wind from getting enough lift to toss it around, and the cast aluminum is heavy enough to keep it staying put, without so much weight that it is hard to move when you want to. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: looks amazing and is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: What a surprise! Well made, a breeze to "install", looks amazing and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DorothyFeht

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item to display under our front yard tree and are very happy with them. They were easy to assemble and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Johnie Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Bistro Set!
customer_reviews.text: Slightly lighter weight than expected. Otherwise, a nice product! Because of it's weight, it can be blown over in a storm. When heavy winds are expected, I lay it down pre-emptively so it doesn't nick and scratch by falling over.
customer_reviews.author: SFK

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Service
customer_reviews.text: Ordering easy; receipt of product great. Was missing a chair leg. Dealing with their customer service EXCELLENT!! Shout out to Alex Monteza. He handled getting my information and replacing my leg quickly, professionally and efficiently! The set is a perfect fit to my front porch. Assembly was about 90 minutes; instructions easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: FL2015!

customer_reviews.title: Weight Capaccity
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the weight capacity for this set was not listed. It is 200 lbs. I'm at 225 and sit on the chairs. I guess it's okay. I haven't had any issues with my weight.
customer_reviews.author: luehan

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but not sturdy at all. My husband will not be able to sit on these chairs and he weights 220 pounds. Other than that, looks great in my porch.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Perez

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the $$ i guess
customer_reviews.text: Not a heavy duty table. Not sturdy. Doesn't sit level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look & very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: great match to the love seat I purchased a few weeks ago. Looks great, very easy to assemble, and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cuadrado

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful french style Bistro set
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful french style Bistro set!! It is light weight (30lbs shipping) but sturdy. It took 1 hour to assembly the set but, I had the right tools. (i.e. Phillips Screw Driver and Socket Wrench) The included wrench will work but it would take so much longer to assemble the set.
customer_reviews.author: Marco 2011

customer_reviews.title: beautifull and elegant
customer_reviews.text: The design is very nice, the quality is good. the table and chair are lightweight, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Raya&Michael

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and nice addition to my patio
customer_reviews.text: This set looks so cute on my patio! Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: KateTall

customer_reviews.title: Great Patio et
customer_reviews.text: The Patio Sense Faustina Antique Bronze 3 piece patio set is great. It was very easy to assemble and looks great in my garden area.
customer_reviews.author: Plkdavis

customer_reviews.title: Looks and durability
customer_reviews.text: Received the items very well packaged, looks beautiful in our pergola..
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great size - beautiful finish
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on your patio or porch without taking up a lot of space. Lightweight and beautifully finished.
customer_reviews.author: BoJo

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. This is very light and much sturdier than what I thought. Looks very nice in the yard
customer_reviews.author: xxx

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy. I'm very small and the chairs wobble
customer_reviews.text: Dissatisfied with the quality of the materials. Not very sturdy. I'm very small and the chairs wobble. Table smaller than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this. Sturdy, but small size, more decorative than functional. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Nisamom

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice little patio set when you don’t want to take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: dredvet

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bistro set
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice on my patio. I was able to put a bronze base under the table and set up an umbrella that looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, beautiful on my porch. Very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara White

customer_reviews.title: smaller than it looks online shorter than it looks online and pretty uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This patio furniture looks online like it's bigger and taller than it is it's actually pretty small and sort of uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: J. Isenhour II

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price and good quality. Works perfect for my setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and looks great in my garden. Feels like good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Please send touch up paint
customer_reviews.text: Very small ... need to get touch up paint it’s chipped
customer_reviews.author: Roseann

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Good investment.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Not particularly heavy weight construction, but seems sturdy. Easy to assemble. I'd recommend using a ratchet to save a lot of time! Well worth the money :-)
customer_reviews.author: matt tupper

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: We replaced some old Adirondack chairs with this set. I am pleased overall with this bistro set.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but a chair leg snapped already.
customer_reviews.text: I love the set but I'm disappointed that one of the chairs broke already. One of the legs snapped off and almost dumped the lady sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: great place to sit while grilling
customer_reviews.text: wanted a bistro set to put on my grill patio, this set looks great! very pleased
customer_reviews.author: glenn.

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: This patio set was exactly what I was looking for. I love the design and it fits perfectly on my front porch. It was very easy to put together. It was also very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Mewhirter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bistro set
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this set. Looks great, looks durable (we shall see) and simple to assemble. Glad it’s just like described! Delivered pretty quick too!
customer_reviews.author: Efrain P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Strong and sturdy and it was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bistro Set!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty set! I wish it came with a suggested little umbrella for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayj

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: The material is very sturdy and durable. Added a lot of curb appeal to my front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Garza

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bistro set
customer_reviews.text: Love this bistro set. It looks great in my courtyard.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Chair missing one leg
customer_reviews.text: I find hard to believe that while packing this item the manufacturer included only 3 legs for one of the chairs, it appears they also have a very poor quality control as most of the chairs bolt threads were stripped, I had to rethread most of the bolts. In their favor the chairs aluminum casting do appear to be solid and well made, time will tell. All things aside is inexcusable for a manufacturer to pack an item with a main component missing, as this agravating and a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not best quality.. company did not provide enough screws to assemble properly
customer_reviews.author: John M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: They are not good quality or made to last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets and all 4 chairs have cracked and broke. They are not good quality or made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice patio set! Easy to assemble and feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JYag

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the yard
customer_reviews.text: Putting this tablet set together took me about an hour. I highly suggest using your own tools versus the ones provided in the packaging. The table and chairs themselves are of very high quality. They feel sturdy and comfortable to sit in. I'm going to leave these in the back yard for those nice days you'd like to enjoy a cup of tea outside. I did have a few issues when putting the thing together. Some of the threads in the screws were not done well. In fact, there's one chair where one leg isn't securely tightened because of this issue. Luckily each leg is secured by two screws each.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: 130 pounds and do not feel comfortable in chair
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap, flimsy. I'm 5'2", 130 pounds and do not feel comfortable in chair. I guess for the $$ it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: w. wilson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful really
customer_reviews.text: Had some trouble with assembly but it was because I did it alone so struggled a bit. But I strut we’re clear and all parts shipped well organized. I used my own tools though. I’m small so sturdiness isn’t an issue yet but this set is light weight. A big person shouldn’t sit on it. It’s just what I wanted for morning coffee and evening wine - looks great on my porch. I bought the suggested cushions but they were too fat- not comfy- returning those but the teal color was lovely- I’ll revisit cushions after I use this for awhile
customer_reviews.author: Lene Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Set
customer_reviews.text: We bought it more for decorative purposes on our front porch. Didn't expect it to be super comfortable to sit on. It's good for enjoying a cup of tea or coffee in the morning. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: chocolate

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this set and it was super easy to assemble. I find the chairs to wobble a little bit but overall it’s really sturdy and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: JR

product_meta.title: Patio Sense Faustina Patio Bistro Set of 3 | Two Aluminum Chair and Table | Outdoor Furniture |Antique Bronze
product_meta.description:
Enjoy a coffee with your loved one with this Faustina Bistro Set by Patio Sense.

This outdoor furniture set contains three pieces of furniture: a round table and two chairs. All of these outdoor furniture pieces are made from high quality resilient cast aluminum and we guarantee that it will not rust or tarnish due to the weather outside. This cast aluminum construction also provides longevity to the metal bistro set and ensures it will last you for years to come. This patio furniture set also features a gorgeous antique bronze finish that lends itself well to any and all outdoor environments.

The scroll design on the patio table and chairs further gives you a very Parisian bistro feel and makes this bistro table set perfect for a relaxing afternoon out on your patio or porch for a cup of coffee and catching up with friends.

This patio set is very easy to assemble and requires no maintenance thereafter. This means that you can simply assemble the pieces and then let them be without taking any special care of the set. Use this elegant and sophisticated patio furniture for relaxing and having a coffee with your friend. The chairs have been designed for a comfortable outdoor sitting experience with an attractive design that allows for a long sitting experience. The round table is simply charming and lends a very French atmosphere to your coffee dates.

This outdoor bistro table set is ideal for any outdoor setting such as your porch, patio, lawn, garden, backyard, or even by your pool. On a rainy day, take the cafe bistro set indoors for a Parisian cafe experience.
feature_bullets: 3 This bistro set contains 3 pieces of furniture, a table, and two chairs.
This outdoor bistro set is made of durable cast aluminum.
This aluminum bistro set features a beautiful antique bronze finish.
This coffee table set requires zero maintenance after assembly.
This patio bistro set will fit in perfectly in any outdoor environment.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars139 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
